Sentencas: Jet fuel reforming was analyzed for both partial oxidation and autothermal reforming processes based on the chemical-reaction equilibria with possible use of solid oxide fuel cells in the auxiliary power units of aircraft to reduce pollutant emissions.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: Parameters considered in this paper were the oxygen-to-carbon ratio (0-0.7), the steam-to-carbon ratio (0-1), and the reformer temperature (500-1200 degrees C).
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: The product compositions and energy change of the reforming process were calculated for 12 hydrocarbons of a surrogate jet fuel under the isothermal conditions and the jet fuel under the adiabatic conditions.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: Solid carbon in the form of graphite was included as one of the products.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: The effect of 12 hydrocarbons on the oxygen-to-carbon ratio at the carbon formation boundary was negligible above 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: Under isothermal conditions, the maximum yield of hydrogen, carbon monoxide, or syngas was at the carbon formation boundary.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: Under adiabatic conditions, the minimum required oxygen-to-carbon ratio to avoid carbon formation was decreased from 0.52 to 0.38 and the corresponding temperature was reduced from 844 to 617 degrees C with the increase of steam-to-carbon ratio from 0 to 1 for the jet fuel reforming.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units

Sentencas: The maximum reforming efficiency based on the synthesis gas was about 83% for the considered steam-to-carbon ratios.
Titulo: Analysis of jet fuel reforming for solid oxide fuel cell applications in auxiliary power units
